Test Steps.Step Expected: \n

Test Steps.Step Action: Land on 'Maintain Election Measure' page
Test Steps.Step Expected:
Verify: New field 'Ballot Measure Status' appears, can be interacted with, and the options 'Pending', 'Rejected', and 'Approved' can be seen and selected.
 
Verify: New field "Ballot Measure Status Reason' appears and can be interacted with. No functional options to select in this menu exist at this time.

Verify: The 'Measure description, long(ballot)*' is unchanged and works as expected.

Verify: 'Response Type' Is unchanged and can be interacted with.

Verify: 'Ballot Measure Order' Can be interacted with, and a number entered in the field.

Title: EM - Elections - Manage Measures End - to - End Scenario

Test Steps.Step Action: Manage Measures
Test Steps.Step Expected: \n

Test Steps.Step Action: \n1. Navigate to 'Search Election Measures' page from Election component 2. Enter Election Date Name3. Select one of the search criteria Election Type, Election Category, District Type, and District4. Click 'Search'\n
Test Steps.Step Expected: \nElection measures matching the search criteria are displayed\n

Test Steps.Step Action: \n1. Navigate to 'Add Election Measure' page 2. Enter Election Date Name, Election Type, and Election Category3. Select Response Type, Region, District Type, and Districts 4. Enter Measure Pass Rate and Ballot Measure details 5. Click 'Save'\n
Test Steps.Step Expected: \nNew election measure is successfully added and displayed in the system\n

Test Steps.Step Action: \n1. Search for an existing election measure from the search election measures page 2. Modify details such as Measure Pass Rate, Ballot Measure Status, Order, and Description3. Click 'Save'\n
Test Steps.Step Expected: \nChanges are successfully saved and reflected in the system\n

Test Steps.Step Action: 1. Search for an existing election measure2. Modify details3. Click "Cancel"
Test Steps.Step Expected: \nChanges are discarded, and previous values remain unchanged\n

Test Steps.Step Action: \n1. Attempt to save an election measure without filling required fields like Public Measure Title or Ballot Measure Description2. Click 'Save'\n
Test Steps.Step Expected: \nSystem displays appropriate validation messages\n

Test Steps.Step Action: \n1. Search for an existing election measure2. Click 'Delete'3. Confirm deletion\n
Test Steps.Step Expected: \nMeasure is removed from the system\n
